bibdata.title: IEC/IEEE International Standard
Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) Test Adapter Description
IEC/IEEE International Standard - Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) Test Adapter Description

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An exchange format using extensible markup language (XML) for identifying all of the hardware, software, and documentation associated with a test adapter is specified in this document. This test adapter may be used as a component of a test program set to test and diagnose a unit under test.
